participant_1.background:
I'm always on the go and my glasses are always dirty, so I take them off and clean them every time I get a chance.
i likw to go to the farmers markets to buy local veggies and fruits.
i hate red meat.
my favorite rapper is yo gotti.
I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind.

participant_2.background:
I try to stay active and eat healthy to make myself feel younger.
I listen to my favorite bands to relax when I'm not at work.
my parents are not married anymore.
I am a hard worker who is always looking for ways to improve myself.
There are quite a few of us, but we all get along.

content.text: Hey! I'm blind, but I still enjoy going to the farmer's market to buy fresh veggies. What about you?
Hey, that's awesome! I like going to the farmer's market too, it's a great way to support local businesses. I try to stay active and eat healthy, so I can feel younger.
That's great! I try to stay active as well. I love listening to my favorite bands to relax. What's your favorite band?
I love the Beatles! Their music is so classic and timeless.
They're my favorite too! I love how their music has stood the test of time.
Yes, they're truly timeless. I also love how they're able to appeal to people of all ages.
Me too! I'm so glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things as you.
Yes, I have a brother and a sister.
That's cool! I have a brother and a sister too.
We're a pretty close-knit family, even though my parents are divorced.
That's great! I'm glad you have a close family.
